articles.title: Russian space boss warns ISS equipment beyond warranty - Macau Business
articles.description: International, MNA | Moscow's Roscosmos space chief warned Friday that most Russian equipment on the International Space Station (ISS) was beyond its warranty, weeks after the station's Russian segment sprang another coolant leak.
